definition: 5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°

sentences.english: Today would have been Senator Kennedy’s 79th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今天是肯尼迪議員先生的79歲誕辰。

sentences.english: Ireceivedan invitation to her birthday party.
sentences.chinese: 我收到了她誕辰宴會的請貼。

sentences.english: As your birthday month gets under way, you’ll feel a great sense of relief.
sentences.chinese: 隨着蠍子們誕辰月的啓動，你會感到一種解脫。

sentences.english: We are publishing it as part of our tribute to Charles Darwin on his 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 借花獻佛，以此向達爾文誕辰200週年獻禮。

sentences.english: Today would have been Bruce Lee's 70th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今天是功夫明星李小龍的70誕辰。

sentences.english: This year sees the tercentenary of Handel's birth.
sentences.chinese: 今年是韓德爾誕辰叄百週年。

sentences.english: In memory of the founder of Chinese modern botany Prof. C. S.
sentences.chinese: 紀念我國植物學的奠基人錢崇澍教授誕辰一百週年。

sentences.english: Poland also organized wonderful events in China marking the bicentenary of Frederic Chopin.
sentences.chinese: 波在華成功舉辦肖邦誕辰200週年活動。

sentences.english: First, why should the birthday of Confucius, established the world's "Education Day"?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要把孔子的誕辰確定爲世界“教育日”？

sentences.english: In honour of your moving out of the twenties, we are giving you a marvelous birthday party.
sentences.chinese: 爲致賀超過二十歲，我們準備了一個昌大的誕辰宴會。

sentences.english: This year is birthday of Peng Zhen of revolutionist of older generation proletariat 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 今年是老一輩無產階級革命家彭真誕辰100週年。

sentences.english: Congratulate the meeting. with best wishes to every one. Fang.
sentences.chinese: 向黃萬里百年誕辰會，表達最美好的祝願。

sentences.english: The celebration of the Jade Emperor’s heavenly birthday has always signaled the winding-down of New Year festivity.
sentences.chinese: 慶賀玉帝誕辰的活動象徵着過年的慶典接近尾聲。

sentences.english: Bronner's is famous for its nativity scenes which show the birth of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 布朗納公司以表現基督誕辰的場景而聞名。

sentences.english: And North Korea is celebrating the 101st birthday of its first President Kim Il Sung.
sentences.chinese: 北朝鮮慶祝首位總統金日成誕辰101週年。

sentences.english: Next week we will be celebrating the sort-of birthday of the sort-of internet.
sentences.chinese: 下週我們將慶祝所謂因特網的所謂誕辰日。

definition: anniversary of the founding of a school
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
